title: The Slum Rehabilitation Scheme submitted by the developer registered with S
clause_text: The Slum Rehabilitation Scheme submitted by the developer registered with S.R.A. shall be strictly in accordance with the provisions of the said Regulations.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
